subject: YOUR CONSIGNMENT HAS BEEN SUCC
body:
YOUR CONSIGNMENT HAS BEEN SUCCESSFULLY SENT TO JOHN F KENNEDY INTERNATIONAL
AIRPORT. FOR MORE INFORMATION CONTACT MR. SANA WITH THE INFORMATION
BELOW.
call +17712080351 or kindly send your reply to 
Sanaparez2@outlook.com

subject: Re: YOUR CONSIGNMENT HAS BEEN SUCC
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited to hear that my package has been sent to John Kennedy Airport! Could you please provide me with more details about this? Like, what is the estimated time of arrival? And how can I track it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: YOUR CONSIGNMENT HAS BEEN SUCC
body:
Reconfirm your information as such

subject: Re: YOUR CONSIGNMENT HAS BEEN SUCC
body:
Hello there,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out to share some information that I believe might be of interest to you. However, before we proceed, could you please confirm if this is the correct email address to reach you at?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Julie
